alert.note: Alert for Sumner (Kansas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 06 at 5:54PM CDT by NWS Wichita
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of central Sumner County through 630 PM CDT... At 554 PM CDT, broadcast media reported a strong thunderstorm over Wellington. This storm was nearly stationary. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Broadcast media. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Wellington, Wellington Airport and Perth. This includes Interstate 35 between Mile Markers 7 and 22. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with this storm and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
